maps.gml.view

Interface SpaceDecorator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilledShapeDecorator, NullSpaceDecorator

    public interface SpaceDecorator
    Interface for objects that know how to decorate GMLSpaces.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decorate(GMLSpace space, java.awt.Graphics2D g, ScreenTransform transform)
      Decorate a GMLSpace.

        Decorate a GMLSpace.
        Parameters:

        g - The graphics to draw on.
